DOC.brief_summary: A prospective evaluation of the visual parameters in a series of patients bilaterally implanted with AcrySof ReSTOR +3 Intraocular Lens (IOL).
DOC.brief_title: Visual Function After Implantation of Bilateral AcrySof ReSTOR Aspheric +3
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with cataracts Preexisting conditions that could skew the results or are contraindications for the ReSTOR intraocular lens; <1 diopter astigmatism by keratometry readings.
